title: PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Research Associate Post
description: Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Research Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Pharm, Ph.D, and Post Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 . Here we mentioned the information about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates c...
